definition.doc: Draft subclass of NXinstrument to describe a photoelectron analyser.

symbols.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays

sym.name: doc
sym.doc: The symbols used in the schema to specify e.g. dimensions of arrays

sym.name: nfa
sym.doc: Number of fast axes (axes acquired symultaneously, without scanning a pysical quantity)

sym.name: nsa
sym.doc: Number of slow axes (axes acquired scanning a pysical quantity)

field.name: description
field.doc: Free text description of the type of the detector

field.name: name
field.doc: Name or model of the equipment

field.name: energy_resolution
field.doc: Overall energy resolution (FWHM of gaussian broadening)

field.name: fast_axes
field.doc: List of the axes that are acquired symultaneously by the detector

field.name: slow_axes
field.doc: List of the axes that are acquired, in order of decreasing speed. For example energy in a swept scan or spin.

group.name: COLLECTION_COLUMN
group.doc: class to describe the electron collection (spatial and momentum imaging) column

group.name: ENERGY_DISPERSION
group.doc: class to describe the energy dispersion section

group.name: SPIN_DISPERSION
group.doc: class to describe the spin dispersion section

group.name: DETECTOR
group.doc: class to describe the electron detector
